articles.title: Ringo Starr cancels North America tour with Covid - BBC
articles.description: The Beatle had previously cancelled dates after catching the virus, before returning to the road.
articles.content:
Sir Ringo Starr has cancelled the rest of his North American tour after testing positive to Covid-19 again.

articles.description: To argue for universal gravitation, Newton had to become a “geodesist.”
